mapper.update:
update subcontractor_resume
subcontractor_id = #{subcontractorId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
project_evaluation = #{projectEvaluation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
project_description = #{projectDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company_evaluation = #{companyEvaluation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
group_evaluation = #{groupEvaluation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
labor_account_id = #{laborAccountId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
construction_scale = #{constructionScale,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update subcontractor_resume set subcontractor_id = #{subcontractorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, project_evaluation = #{projectEvaluation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_description = #{projectDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_evaluation = #{companyEvaluation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, group_evaluation = #{groupEvaluation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, labor_account_id = #{laborAccountId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, construction_scale = #{constructionScale,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM subcontractor_resume sr LEFT JOIN labor_account la ON sr.labor_account_id = la.id LEFT JOIN subcontractor s ON sr.subcontractor_id = s.id LEFT JOIN project p ON sr.project_id = p.id WHERE 1=1
AND s.name LIKE concat('%',#{subcontractorName},'%')
AND sr.company_evaluation LIKE concat('%',#{companyEvaluation},'%')
AND sr.construction_scale = #{constructionScale}

SELECT sr.*, la.team_name AS teamName, p.name AS projectName, s.name AS subcontractorName, s.code AS subcontractorCode, la.contract_person AS contractPerson, la.phone, la.estimated_contract_amount AS contractAmount, la.settlement_amount AS settlementAmount FROM subcontractor_resume sr LEFT JOIN labor_account la ON sr.labor_account_id = la.id LEFT JOIN subcontractor s ON sr.subcontractor_id = s.id LEFT JOIN project p ON sr.project_id = p.id WHERE sr.id = #{id}
